mapper.update: UPDATE zk_dubbo_method_parameter SET method_id = #{methodId}, interface_name = #{interfaceName}, version = #{version}, parameter_name = #{parameterName}, parameter_type = #{parameterType}, parameter_order = #{parameterOrder}, parameter_description = #{parameterDescription}, parameter_schema_json = #{parameterSchemaJson}, gmt_modified = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_method_parameter WHERE method_id = #{methodId} ORDER BY parameter_order ASC
